app_descript:
App Name: iHappy

App Package Name: com.ihappydate

Brief: iHappy serves as a dynamic dating platform catering to individuals seeking meaningful connections. With a focus on ease and convenience, this app streamlines the journey towards love and companionship. Users can revel in a rich dating experience, finding partners who align with their interests and are in close proximity.
